      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="fr">Une cellule de plante et le composant de sa membrane cellulaire</string>
            <string language="en">A plant cell and its cell wall component</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Betriebszelle und sein Zellwandbestandteil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma pilha da planta e seu componente da parede de
pilha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una cellula della pianta ed il relativo 
componente della parete delle cellule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα κύτταρο φυτών και το τμήμα τοίχων κυττάρων του</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una célula de la planta y su componente de la 
pared de célula</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre une cellule de plante, avec sa membrane cellulaire indiqué (à gauche). La cellulose trouvée  dans les membranes cellulaires se compose de plusieurs molécules de glucose (à droite).</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a plant cell, with its cell wall indicated (left). The cellulose found in cell walls is composed of several glucose molecules (right).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">membrane cellulaire</string>
            <string language="en">cell wall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">cellules</string>
            <string language="en">Cells</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">cellulose</string>
            <string language="en">cellulose</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">glucose</string>
            <string language="en">glucose</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">molécules</string>
            <string language="en">molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">cellule de plante</string>
            <string language="en">plant cell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">plantes</string>
            <string language="en">Plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">_ dies Abbildung zeigen ein Betrieb Zelle, mit 
sein cell Zellwand anzeigen (nach links). Die Zellulose, die in 
den Zellwänden gefunden wird, besteht aus einigen Glukosemolekülen 
(recht).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma pilha da planta, com
sua parede de pilha indicada (à esquerda). A celulose 
encontrada em paredes de pilha é composta de diversas moléculas do 
glucose (direitas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una cellula della 
pianta, con la relativa parete delle cellule indicata (a sinistra). 
La cellulosa trovata in pareti delle cellule si compone di 
parecchie molecole del glucosio (di destra).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει κύτταρο φυτών, με τον 
τοίχο κυττάρων της που υποδεικνύεται (αριστερά). Η 
κυτταρίνη που βρίσκεται στους τοίχους κυττάρων αποτελείται από 
διάφορα μόρια γλυκόζης (δεξιά).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una célula de la 
planta, con su pared de célula indicada (a la izquierda). La 
celulosa encontrada en paredes de célula se compone de varias 
moléculas de la glucosa (derechas).</string>
          </description>
